thread.title: Here's Everything Going Down At The 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: Here's Everything Going Down At The 2017 Oscars

author: Jenna Amatulli
title: Here's Everything Going Down At The 2017 Oscars
text:
02/26/2017 05:56 pm ET | Updated 0 minutes ago Here's Everything Going Down At The 2017 Oscars Who will take home a lil' gilded man? Stay tuned! 
The 2017 Oscars are underway! 
All of your favorite celebrities have gathered in one place, looking glamorous and ready to celebrate the year in film. 
We never know what’s going to happen on Hollywood’s biggest night: Will Stacey Dash appear ? Will Jennifer Lawrence fall ? Will we ever stop hearing about how great “ La La Land ” is? 
Keep up with all the happenings at Sunday night’s ceremony with live updates below: ALSO ON HUFFPOST The Oscars: Photos Of Hollywood's Biggest Night Through The Years The Oscars: Photos Of Hollywood's Biggest Night Through The Years 1
